title: Refactoring: Deleting Fields Context Menu Overridden by Message Dialog
description:
On LinuxMotif and Windows 2000:
1. Set up JUnit.
OB: When attempting to delete fields using the context menu, the expected context menu does not appear. Instead, a message dialog promptly prompts whether to delete the getter/setter as well.
EB: The context menu should be displayed when attempting to delete fields, allowing users to choose the appropriate actions. The message dialog should not override the context menu.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Enable the option 'Code Generator - Remove prefix from field names'.
2. Open TestCase.java.
3. In the outliner, right-click on 'fName'.
4. Observe the absence of the expected context menu.
